code: import{request}from'../utils/axios';import{CREATE_CLASSROOM,ADD_CLASSROOM,GET_STUDENT_LIST}from'./types';var TEACHER_URL="/teacher";export function addClassroom(dataToSubmit){var data=request("POST",TEACHER_URL+"/classroom",dataToSubmit);return{type:ADD_CLASSROOM,payload:data};}export function createClassroom(dataToSubmit){var data=request("POST",TEACHER_URL+"/class",dataToSubmit);return{type:CREATE_CLASSROOM,payload:data};}export function getStudentlist(dataToSubmit,class_id){var data=request("GET",TEACHER_URL+"/studentlist/"+class_id,dataToSubmit);return{type:GET_STUDENT_LIST,payload:data};}
